text: Archie Brown (born 28 May 2002) is an English professional footballer who plays as a defender for Gent. On 11 August 2023 Archie signed a contract for 4 years at KAA Gent after playing for Lausanne Sport in Switzerland. He is the fourth Englishman to ever play for the Belgian club. ==References== Category:Living people Category:2002 births Category:English footballers
title: Archie Brown (footballer)
